item.description:

item.title: Length of road, 5th August
item.description:
Is there any plan in future to resurface Crogsland Road? Given the two big building projects recently completed (Charlie Ratchford centre, and then the flat block opposite), the road is in bad condition from all the heavy construction vehicles, with big dips caused by the road sinking, lots of patchwork repairs etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crogsland Road, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Priory Gardens: Substandard Bench Base, 5th August
item.description:
Mon 04 Aug 2025: The bench base being installed by an idverde subcontractor does not meet the standard specified or expected for the Platinum Jubilee Parks Fund project in the Grade II listed park. As specified, the slabs should mirror the reclaimed stone slabs laid elsewhere in the formal gardens during the 1920s and 30s; and the the base ahouls be centred on the pergola opening, NOT off-centre as shown in the attached photos. This is totally unacceptable and needs to be rectified before the bench is installed. TIA

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Is it legal to park a mobile trailer used to sell foodstuffs outside one's house?, 5th August
item.description:
Our neighbour opposite has said that this would be removed and was only a temporary situation. The 'caravan' has no number plate and has now been parked for weeks. It is of course difficult because one does not want to be a 'snitch' but as well as being quite an eye sore it also makes it very difficult for those living next door to park their car. We live in No. 48 Cliffview Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cliffview Road, Ladywell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chislehurst Rec entrance from Walden Rd needs cleaning, 5th August
item.description:
This entrance should be maintained by IdVerde but has not been touched at all this summer. The weeds, fat hen in particular, are taking over and people are becoming less considerate about cleaning up behind their dogs. It is not part of FOCRGâ€™s remit to clean it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
